thread.title: Richard A
thread.title_full: American RV Company reviewed by Richard A

author: Richard A
title: Richard A
text: I ordered one small part which cost less than the shipping. After I received the part and questioned the shipping being more than the part cost. I received a call and Email from the company offering to discount the shipping cost. There was no option for shipping less than standard shipping cost. Once they realized my concern they discounted the shipping cost. I got the correct part on the first try and excellent customer service after the sale. Thanks American RV Company
